cause.description:
Religion is the frame for our life and God gave man mind to use it so its mission for each human on earth from all religions to try to discover the truth the right religion which we should belive in it..Religion Of Noah..Religion Of Ibram..Religion Of Moses and Jesus..Religion Of Mohamed (Peace Up All of Them).
1. Religion is the frame for our life
cause.name: The Religion For God Is the Islam (ان الدين عند الله الاسلام)
